description: With the resignation of Annegret Kramp-Karrenbauer the race for next chancellor appears wide open.
title: Germany's Merkel loses control of her own succession
title_page: Germany's Merkel loses control of her own succession - BBC News
maintext: By announcing that she would hand over some of her power and, in effect, begin the transition to a new political era, she mollified some who feared that she was still tainted, in the eyes of some voters, by her stance over the refugee crisis.
